e1.quote: The truth about yourself is always the hardest to accept.

e2.quote: The wise benefit from a second opinion.

e3.quote: When in doubt, go to the source.

e4.quote: The popular belief isnâ€™t always the correct one.

e5.quote: To love, is to trust. To trust is to believe.

e6.quote: Jealousy is the path to chaos.

e7.quote: Deceit is the weapon of greed.

e8.quote: Without darkness there cannot be light.

e9.quote: Wisdom is born in fools as well as wise men.

e10.quote: What is lost is often found.

e11.quote: Madness can sometimes be the path to truth.

e13.quote: Facing all that you fear will free you from yourself.
